text.citation: Rau, D. V., & Dong, M. N. (2006). Yami texts with reference grammar and dictionary. Institute of Linguistics, Academia Sinica.
text.BibTeX_citation: @book{rau2006yami, title={Yami texts with reference grammar and dictionary}, author={Rau, D Victoria and Dong, Maa-Neu}, year={2006}, publisher={Institute of Linguistics, Academia Sinica}}
text.source: ['4. man’acing so kois', '圈豬腳', 'Tying up pigs', '', 'si apen Kotan/Jinovoy (M, 75, Yayo)', '王仁德，男，75，椰油村', '']

S.FORM: ratateng am, mina ka-doa araw namen a ni-mi-walam a,
S.TRANSL: 後來我們放了兩天的假
After this we had two days of vacation.

S.FORM: ratateng am, “a ta mi-walam, mo ke-hakay a, mi ta man-’acing so korang” koan ko si apen Sidongen a, “nohon”
S.TRANSL: 我跟我的朋友si apen Sidongen說“今天放假，不如我們拿繩子去絆豬玩” ，他說“好啊”
“Today is vacation, so why don’t we go tie the pigs up?” I asked my friend si apen Sidongen. “Sure,” he replied.

S.FORM: “imo rana, mo ke-hakay am,”, sira ka nira apen Mangananao ito, aka da mina Ngapas a, aro sira o ka-raray ko a,
S.TRANSL: 我對si apen Sidongen說，“你呢， ”,當時還有其它的同伴如si apen Mangananao、si Ngapas等，我們好幾個同學。
At the time my friends were si apen Mangananao, si Ngapas, and some others. “What about you,” I asked.

S.FORM: “toyo-en nio do ’a-’acing ko a pinan-an ko”, ji ko ni-pinan-an a, to ko i pa-kedked-a do lima ko a,
S.TRANSL: “你們把豬趕到我的陷阱（繩）中，我則拿著繩子的另一端” ，實際上我不是拿繩子，而是綁在手上
“You chase the pig to where my rope is and I’ll hold the other end.” Actually I tied it around my wrist.

S.FORM: to da noyo-a am, to na novoz-a no rako a aviik a, a ni-m-alam ko pa do ma-k-alan a wakay a,
S.TRANSL: 他們把豬趕過來之後，公豬就跳下去，起先我只是被拖走了大約一個地瓜田的 距離
After they had started to chase the pigs, the hog jumped down. I got dragged about the distance of a sweet potato field.

S.FORM: k-om-zas rana sira o aro a korang am, maci-ka-kezas o rako a aviik o ni-’acing ko a,
S.TRANSL: 後來其它的母豬因受到驚嚇，它們一跑，跟我綁在一起的公豬也跟著緊張
Since the hog jumped, his squealing frightened the sows, and this made the hog I was tied to nervous.

S.FORM: to na malipasíp-an yaken am, ka-teng-an ko pa, to na ma-nila-cilamón-an yaken do ka-ango-an a,
S.TRANSL: 它拖著我穿梭在林投樹叢下奔竄，拖的我暈頭轉向
The hog started running, dragging me through the pandanus bushes, and I didn’t even know what was happening anymore.

W.TRANSL: 虛.動綴-疊-鑽來鑽去-工焦.虛

S.FORM: am-ian do ni-limot da do tey-laod no ili a vahay no kois da am, todey andep am,
S.TRANSL: 公豬一直跑到村莊下緣的一個豬檻，就往那裡跑進去
The hog kept running to the pigsty below the village, and there the hog jumped down.

S.FORM: am to na lipet-an am, to-da zavat am, o ri o ji ko rana ni-maci-lolo-i do korang a.
S.TRANSL: 後來牠又轉了個彎，結果把我跟牠相連的繩子弄斷了，終於擺拖了母豬拖拉的苦難
He passed the fence and turned, and then the rope snapped. Finally the pig wasn’t dragging me around.

S.FORM: ratateng am, aong-en da yaken no ka-raray ko am, ta ikong pa o m-ian, ni-micia-sazi-sazikodkod jiaken,
S.TRANSL: 後來我的同伴們都趕過來看我。啊呀，我身上哪裡還有完好之處？全身到處都是刮傷
My friends all came to look for me. There wasn’t a place on my body that wasn’t scraped up.

W.TRANSL: 過去-主焦.到處都是-疊-刮傷

S.FORM: a mi-ka-doa do oo ko o ni-ma-tokas a, akma ko rana i ni-gagay no takzes a,
S.TRANSL: 我頭上有兩處被撞到流血的，我全身像被刀切割的一樣
There were two places on my head that looked like I had been in a knife fight, and the blood would not stop flowing.

S.FORM: alak-en da rana yaken a hap-en do vahay namen a.
S.TRANSL: 我的同伴們就扶著我回家去了
I was taken home in this fashion.

S.FORM: “ya ni-ma-kongo ya, síno ya na ni-paci-liman-an ya? manga koinio” koan da,
S.TRANSL: 他們說“喂，他怎麼了？跟誰打架了？”
“What happened? Who did he fight with?” they asked.

S.FORM: “kena, man-’acing ta so korang koan na am, namen to noyo-a, ya na ni-lolo no korang a,
S.TRANSL: “他沒跟誰打架。他只是叫我們一起去絆豬，我們就把豬趕過去，然後他就這樣被豬拖走的
“He didn’t fight. He suggested that we go tie up pigs. We only started to chase the pigs, and he got dragged away.

S.FORM: ya na ka-miney-cia-sazi-sazingodngod a m-in-a’ari no taga-tagaw si ke-hakay a”
S.TRANSL: 只不過被碎玻璃之類的東西刮傷及割傷而已”
He just got scraped up by glass and metal. That’s all.”

W.TRANSL: 只是-曾經-到處都是-疊-刮傷

S.FORM: tang! ka-tenng-an pa an, mi-ci-cia-miying sira ori a, “ori o apia do ji mi-wey-walam”,
S.TRANSL: 喝！哪知他們反而哈哈大笑，說“好啊！活該嘛，誰叫他閒不住喲”
Hey, who would guess that they actually started laughing and saying, “All right! It serves him right. He’s the one who just cannot stop moving.”

S.FORM: ka-pandan ko rana do dang a, ratateng am, y-angay da rana yaken do vahay namen a.
S.TRANSL: 當時，我真的痛到了極點。後來他們就送我回家去
At the time, I was already hurting very badly. They took me home.

S.FORM: m-oli sira Ina icialaw aka ni Ama icialaw am, “a ya ni-ma-kongo si ke-hakay nio a, nio k-ai do vahay namen?”
S.TRANSL: 我的父母親從山上回來，看見我的同伴們，就問說“你們的朋友怎麼了？你們為什麼來我們家？”
My parents came back from the mountains and saw my friends, so they asked, “What happened to your friend? Why is everyone in our home?”

S.FORM: “a ya m-ian so na ka-pi-ápi-an ni ke-hakay a, ya ni-mika-sazi-sazingodngod a ya ni-micia-’ari-’ari so kataotao”,
S.TRANSL: “我們的朋友傷得體無完膚，遍體鱗傷”
“Our friend is maimed, and his body is full of cuts.”

S.FORM: ta ikong o anga-ngáy-an ko a adaday a loi-loit ko, ta ni-rios da yaken no ka-raray ko?
S.TRANSL: 當時我何止是體無完膚，還一身的髒兮兮呢，我的同伴們也不幫我洗澡
At the time I was completely covered with cuts and bruises and I was filthy, but my friends didn’t help me get a bath.

S.FORM: ratateng am, arios-en na rana yaken ni Ama icialaw am, ta ni-micia-’ai-’ait o siko-siko ko am, siri-siri ko am, ata-atang ko a,
S.TRANSL: 後來還是我父親幫我洗的澡。因為我的手肘，身體兩側，屁股等到處都是割傷
At the end my father helped me wash. My arms, both sides of my body, and my bottom were all full of cuts.

W.TRANSL: 過去-主焦.到處都是-疊-割傷

S.FORM: ta no t-om-iknoz ko am, ba ba ba ba koan ko a.
S.TRANSL: 每遇前有障礙物，我都閃避不及的撞個啪啦啪啦響
Every time there was something in the way, I would go pop pop pop (run into and break the objects).

S.FORM: to da a-cita yamen no ma-naod so tawaz a sira do ma-lavong a ma-naod so tawaz am,
S.TRANSL: 路過某處，被正在編織魚網的sira do malavong漁團看見了
We passed a place where the sira do malavong fishing organization was just weaving nets.

S.FORM: ya ji a-pia si ke-hakay a, ya ji á-ni-ma-vaci o ai-ai na am, lima-lima na,
S.TRANSL: 我們的朋友，他還好啦，他沒有斷手斷腳啦
But he’s alright. His arms and legs aren’t broken yet.

S.FORM: “tang ang!” “a imo pa sio, mo pi-aavoada a ji mi-walam, apia o akma sang?”,
S.TRANSL: “為什麼？” “你怎麼老是閒不住呢，你看你像什麼樣子？”
“Why?” “Jeez, why can’t you just cool down? Look what you’ve done to yourself.”

S.FORM: ratateng am, ka-pang-za da jiaken so asa ka pinareng do dang do ni-pan-nngan-nngan ko a.
S.TRANSL: 後來我父母親就宰殺一隻羊，為我受重傷的事給我壓壓驚
My parents killed a goat afterwards in order to help me recover from my shock.

W.TRANSL: 過去.受焦-動綴-疊-受重傷
